<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[189, 14, 815, 42]]<|/det|>
und wähle \(c_1, c_2, c\) so, dass für \(s=0\) der Punkt 

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[189, 52, 690, 80]]<|/det|>
\((h_1(0), h_2(0), w(0))\) auf \((t, t, t)\) liegt: 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[220, 88, 415, 155]]<|/det|>
\[ \begin{pmatrix} c_1 \\ \frac{1}{c_1} + c_2 \\ c \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} t \\ t \\ t \end{pmatrix} \]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[159, 166, 520, 196]]<|/det|>
\[ \Rightarrow c_1 = t, \quad \frac{1}{c_1} + c_2 = t, \quad c = t \]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[220, 204, 600, 232]]<|/det|>
\[ \Rightarrow c_1 = c = t \quad \text{und} \quad c_2 = t - \frac{1}{t} \]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[139, 264, 920, 291]]<|/det|>
3. Schritt: Lösungsfunktion durch Parameter \(s\) & \(t\) beschreiben 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[189, 301, 630, 328]]<|/det|>
\[ (1) \quad h_1(s) = s + c_1 = s + t \quad (= x_1(s, t)) \]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[189, 336, 592, 366]]<|/det|>
\[ (2) \quad h_2(s) = \frac{1}{s+c_1} + c_2 = \frac{1}{s+t} + t - \frac{1}{t} \]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[310, 376, 444, 402]]<|/det|>
\[ (= x_2(s, t)) \]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[189, 415, 508, 441]]<|/det|>
\[ (3) \quad w(s) = c = t \quad (= u(s, t)) \]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[189, 475, 585, 501]]<|/det|>
\[ \rightarrow (1) \quad x_1 = s + t \quad \Leftrightarrow \quad s = x_1 - t \]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[245, 508, 640, 544]]<|/det|>
\[ (2) \quad x_2 = \frac{1}{s+t} + t - \frac{1}{c} = \frac{1}{x_1} + t - \frac{1}{t} \]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[310 551, 544, 577]]<|/det|>
\[ 0 = \frac{t}{x_1} + t^2 - 1 - x_2 t \]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[320, 583, 570, 610]]<|/det|>
\[ = t^2 + t \left( \frac{1}{x_1} - x_2 \right) - 1 \]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[245, 617, 600, 666]]<|/det|>
\[ t_{1/2} = \frac{x_2 - \frac{1}{x_1} \pm \sqrt{\left( \frac{1}{x_1} - x_2 \right)^2 + 4}}{2} \]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[245, 682, 718, 708]]<|/det|>
da \(t > 0\): nur "\(+\)" Vorzeichen relevant 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[245, 718, 703, 787]]<|/det|>
\[ u(s, t) = u(x) \]
